TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IInstanceProvider

summary.span: 声明一些方法，以便为 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务提供服务对象，或回收该服务的服务对象。

span.span: Declares methods that provide a service object or recycle a service object for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口，以便在 对象请求或释放服务对象时，控制服务对象的创建和回收。Implement the interface to control the creation and recycling of service objects when one is requested or disposed by an object. 实现 接口后，您必须使用终结点行为（ 对象）或协定行为（ 对象）将自定义实例提供程序对象分配给 属性。Once the interface is implemented, you must assign your custom instance provider object to the property using either an endpoint behavior (a object) or a contract behavior (a object). 如果插入机制为终结点行为，则您还能实现可使用配置文件插入自定义行为的 对象。If the insertion mechanism is an endpoint behavior you can also implement a object that can insert your custom behavior using a configuration file. 如果插入机制为协定行为，您可以在打开服务主机之前以编程方式插入行为，也可以实现自定义属性。If the insertion mechanism is a contract behavior, you can insert the behavior programmatically prior to the opening of the service host or you can implement a custom attribute. （有关此协定行为的示例，请参见“示例”部分。）(For an example of the contract behavior approach, see the Example section.) 有两种方法： 和 。 has two methods, and . 通常，实现这些方法的目的是使用非默认构造函数创建服务对象，或者初始化或释放与对象的生存期相关的某种状态。These methods are typically implemented to create service objects using a non-default constructor or to initialize or dispose of some state related to the lifetime of the object. 例如，服务对象池就属于一种自定义 功能。Service object pooling is one example of custom functionality. 通常，在第一次创建 时， 会调用 ，在 关闭时，调用 。Typically, the invokes the when the is first created and invokes the method when the is closed. 有两种方法可使 对象在 关闭之前释放服务对象。There are two ways to cause an object to release a service object before the is closed. 第一种方法是将 设置为 或 。The first method is to set the to or . 第二种方法是调用 方法。The second method is to call the method. 如果执行此操作， 将对调度程序的实例提供程序调用 方法。If this is done, the calls the method on the dispatcher's instance provider. 如果新消息到达时释放实例后，WCF 会创建新的实例使用方法。If a new message arrives after the instance has been released, WCF creates a new instance using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果服务的 为 ，则系统不会调用 或 方法（即使用户未提供已知的服务对象），除非用户直接调用 ，再调用 。If the of the service is , the system does not call the or methods even when the user did not provide a well-known service object unless the user directly calls and then calls . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现可提供“单一实例”行为的 ；它始终返回同一服务实例，且不回收该服务实例。The following code example shows how to implement that provides "singleton" behavior; it always returns the same service instance and does not recycle it. [!code-csharp[IContractBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/cs/objectproviderbehavior.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IContractBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/vb/objectproviderbehavior.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个自定义属性，该自定义属性可实现 ，从而插入自定义服务实例提供程序。The following code example shows how to implement a custom attribute that implements to insert the custom service instance provider. 它还实现可将其用法绑定到特定协定的 。It also implements , which binds its use to a specific contract. [!code-csharp[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/cs/objectproviderbehavior.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/vb/objectproviderbehavior.vb#2)]

summary.span: 如果给出指定的 对象，则返回服务对象。

span.span: Returns a service object given the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可控制 WCF 服务将在尝试创建一个新时收到的确切服务对象。Use the method to control the exact service object that a WCF service receives when it attempts to create a new one. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现可提供“单一实例”行为的 ；它始终返回同一服务实例，且不回收该服务实例。The following code example shows how to implement that provides "singleton" behavior; it always returns the same service instance and does not recycle it. [!code-csharp[IContractBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/cs/objectproviderbehavior.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IContractBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/vb/objectproviderbehavior.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个自定义属性，该自定义属性可实现 ，从而插入自定义服务实例提供程序。The following code example shows how to implement a custom attribute that implements to insert the custom service instance provider. 它还实现可将其用法绑定到特定协定的 。It also implements , which binds its use to a specific contract. [!code-csharp[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/cs/objectproviderbehavior.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IContractBehavior#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/icontractbehavior/vb/objectproviderbehavior.vb#2)]

span.span: The service object to be recycled.

summary.span: 在 对象回收服务对象时调用。

span.span: Called when an object recycles a service object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可执行某些自定义资源释放操作，或者在服务回收服务对象时执行其他回收自定义操作。Use the method to perform some custom resource disposal or other recycling customization when a service recycles a service object.
